title: logo font.
content:
Need help identifying the two fonts used on this logo. Any help is greatly appreciated! :)

Font: 

 No 

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [billllly.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415144710/http:/typophile.com/files/billllly.jpg) | 214.21 KB |
author: jennmertle

comments.content:
"Billy...": **Chicago Style DNA** , Dave Simpson (Sign DNA, 1999)  
"AUTO & TRUCK..." looks like **[Impact](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415144710/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=MS-Windows-Fonts&ffam=Impact%20-%20Regular&fid=9f55a26d868843e465aeeb10dd59d64c&fsize=60&text=AUTO%20%26%20TRUCK%20REPAIR&fit=1)**

------------------  
I found them using "Find my Font": [http://www.findmyfont.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415144710/http:/www.findmyfont.com/ "http://www.findmyfont.com")
